tuv.seg: (hold CTRL or COMMAND to select multiple options)
You do not have permission to modify this record.
[Address Book] Can browse the address book
[Address Book] Can import/upload records into the address book
[Address Book] Can modify e-mail address contacts
[Address Book] Can broadcast compose e-mail to address lists
[Address Book] Can export e-mail address lists to CSV/XML
[Address Book] Can export organization lists to CSV/XML
[Display Ticket] Can forward tickets to third-party e-mail addresses
[Display Ticket] Can add sticky notes to tickets
[Home] Can auto-refresh on the Home page
[Home] Can build private workspaces and worklists
[Mail] Can open tickets on behalf of customers
[Mail] Can use the Overview tab on the Mail page
[Mail] Can use the Search tab on the Mail page
[Mail] Can compose new messages from the helpdesk
[RSS] Can export lists as RSS feeds
[Tasks] Can export task lists to CSV/XML
[Tickets] Can assign tickets to other workers
[Tickets] Can broadcast reply to ticket lists
[Tickets] Can bulk update tickets in lists
[Tickets] Can export ticket lists to CSV/XML
[Tickets] Can use the pile sorter on lists
Blank values for custom fields should clear the field (if unchecked, blank values are skipped)

Replace all passwords with import values, even if they already exist
(any column order; the next step will let you choose where the data goes)

examples: now today -2 days -1 month, 2 days last Friday next Monday Jan 9 2002
Any words: payment receipt order sale Booleans: +payment -receipt +payment credit Wildcards: web* Exact phrases: "credit card" Boosting: cerberus >helpdesk login
Use an asterisk (*) for wildcards. For example: *receipt*
